descriptionHtml:
Hey guys i bring u yet another main menu theme of what we all love and know The Shire probably one of the nicest songs and most beautiful place in Middle Earth i hope u all enjoy this one like u did with the Song of Durin main menu theme.


like before no esp just extract the data folder to ur skyrim main directory and load up ur game and sit back to listen to the sounds of the shire while looking at gandalf approaching bilbo's home Enjoy!!

CREDITS:
Peter Jackson for his wonderful LOTR trilogy
Howard Shore for his beautiful music
J.R.R Tolkien the man who made it all possible
Google for the image(s)
Bethseda for a great game
author: Nordshieldbro
